Just to clear everything up before I get to my next post involving Magmatron, 
nobody is with him, Magmatron is all alone, as far as I know Mantella is 
still in the Destron base. Bobertron is in charge, Pantron is off searching 
for the Key to the Ark, which Magmatron still has a copy of in his main 
computer.

::Bobertron::

    "All Destrons," He started speaking into the comm system of the ship. 
"You may know me, some may not. I am Bobertron, as of now I am the temporary 
leader od the Destron forces. Magmatron has left and is not sure if he will 
be coming back."
    He hoped that they would accept him as a leader, he didn't want a riot on 
his hands. Or mech fluid on the floor. "Please join me in the mess hall, I 
wish to speak with you personally." He needed to meet the Destrocons.
